Description: Plain undyed linen fragment; plain weave: warp-undyed linen (S/19); weft-undyed linen (S/12); tapestry: warp-undyed linen (5 ends grouped/5 ribs per cm), weft- purple wool (S/42); one band of tapestry, 4.5cm high; supplementary weft in purple wool, 2 stripes of 3 picks; one border with fringe (3.5cm long)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
